nodes.text: The Alkharan Bandit Camp was a camp used by the criminal group known as the Alkhara Bandits during the Galactic Civil War. It was located in the Dune Sea, on the world of Tatooine, at a short distance of Jabba's Palace. Circa 1 ABY, Reelo Baruk hired a spacer to kill ten Alkharan bandits in their camp because they had previously attacked merchants under the protection of the Hutt crime lord Jabba Desilijic Tiure.
